comments: I loved the game up until the date of this review. Too many new customizations require leaf tickets. Which translate into micro-transactions. I was able to get everything in the game without spending money up until now. Now I have spend money in order to get the more interesting content. Sadly, this app will be deleted. I am not giving Nintendo even more of my money, it is not a real Animal Crossing game to waste money on.

I love playing this game, but now I can't get into the game, all I get is support error 802-9016. Don't try and tell me to move closer to the WiFi source, because I put my phone on the WiFi router and got the same thing. My wife, who is sitting next to me, gets into the game just fine. I uninstalled that game, same thing... I would love to get back into this game, and will change my first reassuring back to a 5, but until then... Yeah... Please help....

First-time reviewer and life-long Animal Crossing player. This game combines everything good about the game series like fishing, but catching, gardening, decorating, and more. Therea is always an event going on to keep me playing multiple times a day. The team behind this game actually listen to what people say and fix it and add ease of play features! People saying this is pay to play are full of it. I have well over 600 leaf tickets from just playing the game... you just have to put in the time and complete challenges.

I love the happy music and the relaxed vibe I get while playing this game. Easy enough for young children to learn to play, but not so infantile that an adult can't enjoy it instead. The garbled chipmunk-speak language of the animal friends is hilarious! Level progression seems fair and regular. Pay-to-play options are not necessary to have a good game experience.

I would give this 5/5 across the board, as I have been playing since the November release and enjoyed every moment. Every update has made the game better, as the team listens and integrates whatever they can to make it better.  Microtransactions are ignorable, and they give leaf tickets hand over fist, besides the customizables for the campsite (foreground, midground, background) which are expensive.  Hopefully future updates brings better options.

Just like the actual Animal Crossing games, but with even MORE to do! The only difference is you're a camp owner instead of a town mayor. Oh, and the fact that's it's a FREE app!   Seriously, this is a real deal AC game all squeezed into a free app. It's perfection all around if you like games like AC. They did such an amazing job on it.
description: Get back to nature in Animal Crossing‚Ñ¢: Pocket Camp, the new Animal Crossing mobile game where you take on the role of campsite manager!You're in charge, so you can decorate your own campsite however you like! Make it fun, make it cute, make it sporty‚Äîit‚Äôs up to you to craft the kind of furniture and amenities that will make your camp a must-see for animals visiting the area.Steps to Creating Your Best Campsite- Help Animals As You Explore!While visiting different recreational spots, you'll meet new animals who could use a little help. They'll be looking for fish, fruit, bugs, and other things to get their camping adventures started‚Äîand when you help them out, you'll earn Bells and craft materials in return!- Craft Furniture and AmenitiesThe craft materials you earn by fulfilling animals‚Äô requests can be used to craft all sorts of furniture and amenities for your campsite.Just open up the Craft menu and place an order with Cyrus, the hardworking handyman from Re-Tail on the Road. Then sit back and wait! Or, if you're in a hurry, you can move your order to the very front of the line by using Leaf Tickets. You can purchase Leaf Tickets with real money, or earn them through regular gameplay.- Your Campsite. Your Way.The joy of the Animal Crossing: Pocket Camp game is creating a space that suits you and your style.Your campsite can be anything you like‚Äîfrom a traditional space that celebrates nature to a flashy fun house with concerts and rides. It's all up to you!You can also customize your camper, visit your friends' campsites to get ideas for your own, and meet new animal friends as you explore recreational areas!- Host Animals at Your CampsiteAs you grow your friendships with different animals, they'll want to visit your campsite. Craft and decorate with their favorite items, and you‚Äôll be able to host them whenever you like‚Äîeven if you change up your decorations completely!Note: This game is a free download with in-app purchases.Note: A persistent Internet connection is required to play Animal Crossing: Pocket Camp.Cellular data charges may apply.
descriptionHTML:
Get back to nature in Animal Crossing™: Pocket Camp, the new Animal Crossing mobile game where you take on the role of campsite manager!

You're in charge, so you can decorate your own campsite however you like! Make it fun, make it cute, make it sporty—it’s up to you to craft the kind of furniture and amenities that will make your camp a must-see for animals visiting the area.

Steps to Creating Your Best Campsite
- Help Animals As You Explore!
While visiting different recreational spots, you'll meet new animals who could use a little help. They'll be looking for fish, fruit, bugs, and other things to get their camping adventures started—and when you help them out, you'll earn Bells and craft materials in return!

- Craft Furniture and Amenities
The craft materials you earn by fulfilling animals’ requests can be used to craft all sorts of furniture and amenities for your campsite.

Just open up the Craft menu and place an order with Cyrus, the hardworking handyman from Re-Tail on the Road. Then sit back and wait! Or, if you're in a hurry, you can move your order to the very front of the line by using Leaf Tickets. You can purchase Leaf Tickets with real money, or earn them through regular gameplay.

- Your Campsite. Your Way.
The joy of the Animal Crossing: Pocket Camp game is creating a space that suits you and your style.

Your campsite can be anything you like—from a traditional space that celebrates nature to a flashy fun house with concerts and rides. It's all up to you!

You can also customize your camper, visit your friends' campsites to get ideas for your own, and meet new animal friends as you explore recreational areas!

- Host Animals at Your Campsite
As you grow your friendships with different animals, they'll want to visit your campsite. Craft and decorate with their favorite items, and you’ll be able to host them whenever you like—even if you change up your decorations completely!

Note: This game is a free download with in-app purchases.

Note: A persistent Internet connection is required to play Animal Crossing: Pocket Camp.
Cellular data charges may apply.

comments: Saw in Facebook and thought I would give it a try. I am now addicted. I love how realistic they make the interaction seem. The only things that would make it better is if it would let us type our own responses and the system understood them and was able to respond and if there was actually more "proving innocence" and less tetrisy type games.. But that doesn't not effect my interest at all. Most addictive and fun game I have found. Will def recommend

I really like this game!  The game feels so real. The text messages you send out and get are from your actual time! Oh to make the game more interesting...you go to the dial tone dial 893702 the erase it don't hit call. At the bottom it will say chat, settings, etc. Click on those then go back to dial tone and repeat. This will give you more "money" to buy more lives and stuff. This really helps make the game more interesting! I am currently addicted :)

I've been playing this game off and on for ages, I love the storyline to it and the interaction with the other characters - the only thing to make that better would be if we could submit our own responses rather than the two choices given. The puzzles I like, but it would be interesting to have different types of puzzles rather than the same one repeatedly.  Got to the witness protection part of the game and it has frozen on me. I have collected all stars but no interaction is coming up on the text screen so not sure what to do next!!

I left a negative review at first before uninstalling it. After a few days or so, I deleted the review and decided to give it another chance and installed it again. So glad that I did! Now I love this game. I find it interesting with the storyline as well as the puzzles. It does leave me curious about how I'd react or what I'd say if it was real instead of a game. I was hoping to get it on another device, but this game isn't compatible with it. Thank you for this game! I ended up having to start the game all over again since I had to factory reset my phone, so this is 2 reviews in one. I love this game and it's very addicting to me since I'm addicted to it. Even after I get all the goals completed with the puzzles, I still want to continue. Love the storyline since it keeps my interest. Thank you for creating this game for all of us to continue to play and enjoy.

This game is great. It's my favorite game of all thus far. I love this game. It's so addicting and the story line is perfect. I love how you can text and also receive/make calls. Great game for people who like puzzles and mystery. Passes the time quickly. Only thing I am having problems with is trying to link it to my facebook. The first time I had this game I had gotten pretty far and logged in with ease, long story short, got a new phone, installed my game, try to connect to my facebook for my saved game and.... my phone glitches and shuts me out. So I had to start over. Other than that this game is great I would recommend to anyone.

I absolutely love this game but I had something glitch to where I have all my messages but the block buster game said I've only completed the first set of puzzles when I was actually on probably the sixth or seventh. I tried playing along thinking it has to do with someone hacking my messages in the game but to no avail. I'm considering uninstalling and reinstalling I just don't want to go that far back and have to start over with how slow it is to progress. Please help!
description: I Am Innocent is an original detective game with puzzle elements. Use realistic in-game phone calls, a messenger, computer hacking, photographs, and documents to investigate a series of murders with teenage victims. The killings are somehow connected to the disappearance of your sister many years ago.The game‚Äôs many characters, with their complex personalities and skeletons in the closet, plus its ethical dilemmas and emotional scenes create a realistic atmosphere and weave an involved, mysterious story that‚Äôll keep you engrossed to the very end.Main features:- Investigate a complicated serial killer case.- Realistic phone calls, photos, documents, and computer hacking.- Communicate easily without needing to deal with huge paragraphs of text.- Your answers affect your relationships with the characters.- Multiple ending options, depending on your choices and your relationships.- Many days of gameplay.This game is completely free but might include some optional in-app purchases that make it easier to finish.
descriptionHTML:
I Am Innocent is an original detective game with puzzle elements. Use realistic in-game phone calls, a messenger, computer hacking, photographs, and documents to investigate a series of murders with teenage victims. The killings are somehow connected to the disappearance of your sister many years ago.

The game’s many characters, with their complex personalities and skeletons in the closet, plus its ethical dilemmas and emotional scenes create a realistic atmosphere and weave an involved, mysterious story that’ll keep you engrossed to the very end.

Main features:

- Investigate a complicated serial killer case.
- Realistic phone calls, photos, documents, and computer hacking.
- Communicate easily without needing to deal with huge paragraphs of text.
- Your answers affect your relationships with the characters.
- Multiple ending options, depending on your choices and your relationships.
- Many days of gameplay.

This game is completely free but might include some optional in-app purchases that make it easier to finish.

comments: This game is awesome and I love playing it. Im trying to build a massive farm in the village. Great time killer and addictive.You can build anything. The down side is though, that if youre building an enclosed area, the villagers get in and you have to wait for them to get out so you   can close it.

You shouldn't have a certain amount of blocks. Also you shouldent have to unlock everything except for the basic packs. The way you have to jump I am not a fan of I wish it was on the other side. Lastly is it would be nice to have doors,so the viligers couldn't get into your house. One more thing is I wish you didn't have all of these assignments to do to get money and diamonds.

It's a okay game. Dumb thing though is you cannot craft blocks... you will need 10,000's stone brick and only get 150 every few hours. Developers and support staff are useless. You will have to spend money.
This game is amazing. It wastes your spare time which is great. Just one problem. The blocks go down too quickly can you make it so the blocks dont go down?  Thank you!

I love this game. When my sister downloaded it on her iPad i was sooo addicted to it and now i am downloading it on my own phone!!!! I really recommend to try it at least for once. If you will do so you will not be able to delete it easily beacuse you will be addicted!!!!!

Block Craft is a free game for the whole family: from kids, boys and girls, to adults.Features:‚Ä¢  Fun building game: Lots of different constructions. Build a house, a castle, a mine or even the death-star and Eiffel Tower!‚Ä¢  Perfect game for the family: boys and girls will love it.‚Ä¢  One of the best simulation games: it's a fun and free simulator game! ‚Ä¢  Lots of pixels: enjoy the special pixel graphics.‚Ä¢  Free game: play for free!‚Ä¢  Choose your character: boy or girl?‚Ä¢  New: adopt and play with animals! It's fun!Highlights: Amazing buildings in 3DReady? Block? Go! Learn the game by building your house, a fortress or a mine... Decorate your building with your furniture with your own skins! Play now one of the best construction games!Lots of Pets and free explorationPlay with pets! Adopt a dog, a cat or even an elephant! Unlike other block games, there are no monsters in Block Craft 3D: you can focus on constructing the best buildings or exploring the world.Multiplayer game: visit your friendsStart the exploration! You can visit the city built by your friends (or foes) and help them finish their construction. Multiplayer is so much fun!Create and sellIn Block Craft, no need for mods, launcher or PE. descriptionHTML:
Do you like building games?
Block Craft 3D is a new free city building game.

Download now one of the best simulation games of 2017!
Start building and show the world your constructions. Block Craft is a free game for the whole family: from kids, boys and girls, to adults.

Features:
• Fun building game: Lots of different constructions. Build a house, a castle, a mine or even the death-star and Eiffel Tower!
• Perfect game for the family: boys and girls will love it.
• One of the best simulation games: it's a fun and free simulator game!
• Lots of pixels: enjoy the special pixel graphics.
• Free game: play for free!
• Choose your character: boy or girl?
• New: adopt and play with animals! It's fun!

Highlights:
Amazing buildings in 3D
Ready? Block? Go! Learn the game by building your house, a fortress or a mine... Decorate your building with your furniture with your own skins! Play now one of the best construction games!

Lots of Pets and free exploration
Play with pets! Adopt a dog, a cat or even an elephant! Unlike other block games, there are no monsters in Block Craft 3D: you can focus on constructing the best buildings or exploring the world.

Multiplayer game: visit your friends
Start the exploration! You can visit the city built by your friends (or foes) and help them finish their construction. Multiplayer is so much fun!

Create and sell
In Block Craft, no need for mods, launcher or PE. You can create the custom blocks, craft special furniture or complete blueprint of building! And even better: sell those and receive lots of gems!

Not so creative?
In Block Craft 3D, no need for maps, just visit the village of your friends to get new ideas and follow the blueprints and guides to easily build fantastic constructions.

Review by tech website Techtudo:
"... Block Craft is a beautiful and fun game. (...) fans of Minecraft will spend hours exploring and having fun in a complete, free game for mobile phones".

Block Craft is one of the best building games! Try this simulator now and have fun building your city!

Block Craft 3D: Free Building is brought to you by Fun Games for Free, creator of the 100+ Million downloads games Flight Pilot Simulator, Sniper 3D and Sniper Shooter.

title: Block Craft 3D: Building Simulator Games For Free

comments: This game is very fun and addicting. My only complaint is there isn't enough variation in the astromons. Some of them you can tell they are based off of a certain elemental character that's say...water but then the fire version is the same looking just red instead of blue. It's strange. Maybe change up how they look a bit more like in Pokemon with all of eevee evolutions. But then again it's a free game and I have been having a blast playing it. Thank you.

As a beginner in the game, all the interaction menus and stuff you need to get to, or just wanna check out, take way to long to get to, as they're complicated and hold a lot of the game in them. It'd be great if there were an easier way to figure out what they do, to get the most out of the game as a newbie, instead of going through 30 tutorials of their own to find out. Otherwise, I love the gameplay, characters, and art. Great game all in all.

It's nice overall. But you gotta spend a lot if you want 5 star units. I already did 3-4 600 gem summons and everytime they just give you 1 4stars unit the rest are 2 and 3 stars even when they say 'chances up'.

Please fix the constant crashing during clan battles. Other than that its a wonderful games. Also it's becomes harder get gold as you level up which sucks. I love the game. Cute astromon, Wonderful evolutions, and even a nice story!

so I have been playing this game for awhile now and the only major flaw I have found is that if you choose to pay for astrogems they are ridiculous expensive for pretty much nothing. I understand it is probably so it doesn't come as a pay to win game but ya. Also I wish appearance rates for rares and up for better.  I love this game. Really not an understatement. It's the perfect time killer and for me I doesn't get old. The only thing I would change is on the hard and extreme levels I wouldn't have the astromon revert to their original forms after you catch them.

There is no other game that I have ever found quite like Monster Super League. It's fun to play, the monsters have great designs, and while spending real world money is an option, it's not required to progress. And progressing without spending money is easy. I wish there were more games like this one out there.

descriptionHTML:
# Adventure with the Astromons!
Monster Super League summons you to the fantasy world of Astromons!
From cute to stylish, catch & collect monsters of all sizes and shapes!
Collect over 550 types of Astromon in Monster Super League!

# I Choose You!
Catch wild Astromons out there in the field, or summon them by hatching the mysterious eggs!
Collect & evolve your favorite Astromons!

# Evolve and Grow!
Your Astromons will evolve to change in looks and gain additional skills.
Sometimes, they will evolve into very rare variants with even more power!

# Strategic Combat!
Even the same Astromons can differ by attributes & combat style.
Build your team to adventure through over 100 stages in various natural environments!

# Populate your Airship!
Astromons you catch & summon get to live on your airship.
Sometimes you might even have a surprise visitor!

# Socialize with friends!
Summon your friends from all around the world to chat and exchange gifts and tips!

# Become stronger in your own way!
Collect Astromons with different attributes to build your own best team.
Grow your Astromons faster by feeding fruits, and unlock additional powers with special runes!

# Immersive Content!
Dive deep into the story of Astromons through 8 different regions!
Challenge yourself in daily Dungeons for better rewards!
Battle against other players in the Astromon League!

Access requests for gameplay (Game services restricted if disabled)
1) Only for game installation purposes, this application requests access to external memory.

comments: Literally unplayable. Game pauses itself in the middle of races multiple times. I am nowhere near touching the paise button and even went as far as to place my phone on the ground and touch the phone with only one finger on the accelerate button. SOMEHOW the game pauses itself 7 times during that race. Uninstalling.

It is fun and challenging. Had it on my last phone and it often glitched during races which basically ruins that race. Downloaded it on my new phone which is much more powerful, thinking it would be fine, but it glitches in the same way and with the same frequency. It would be really nice if they could "ditch the glitch" so to speak. Thanks

So hard to beat the game. I'm not gonna say anything except it is PAY TO WIN. No rewards, you have to spend real money to beat your NOVICE rival, yup you read it right, novice. So freaking hard to beat the actual scripted AI. And you can't buy anything in shop without real money.

Love the game, play everyday esp the jam tracks. Controls are very inconsistent. Seems like you are limited to how fast you can go. When  it appears you about to better your time you lose control of your bike..sick of the glitches and feels like i have to pay to win

Been playing for a few years and about to quit because every time I have a lead my bike goes forward by itself and starts glitching. Almost feels like I'm being cheated out of a good run. Maybe it's because I don't pay to play. Please fix or I'm deleting!

The one thing that wrecks the game for me is the little hangup glitches that happen constantly.  You need to be precise to win races, and it's pretty hard to do that when the game is always stuttering.  Running on a brand new MotoZ2 Play, btw.

You can even follow real-life professional motocross racers ‚Äì almost all of them play Mad Skills ‚Äì and take on their best times.WEEKLY COMPETITIONS!Mad Skills Motocross 2 features an online competition called JAM, which pits you against fellow players across the world on new tracks every week. JAM will likely be one of the most addicting experiences you‚Äôve ever had on your mobile device.CUSTOMIZABLE BIKES AND RIDERS Change the color of your bike and your rider‚Äôs gear, and add your favorite number to your bike‚Äôs number plate. descriptionHTML:
The best side-scrolling motocross game ever made just got better!

Discover what professional racers, motocross fans, and casual gamers across the globe already know: Mad Skills Motocross 2 is the most intense Android racing experience of all time!

Mad Skills Motocross 2 includes:

UNBELIEVABLE PHYSICS!
Mad Skills Motocross 2 features the best motorcycle physics of any side-scrolling racing game on the planet. You’ll be amazed at the responsiveness of the bikes in this game. The more you play, the faster (and more addicted) you’ll get.

11 DIFFERENT BIKES!
Work your way up through 11 different motorcycles, each with different speeds and handling. Get the fastest bike and dominate your friends!

AN EXCITING NEW PLAYER-VS.-PLAYER “VERSUS” MODE 
This feature is an absolute blast. Choose a friend (or random opponent), pick a track, and lay down the best lap time you can in two minutes. Then see if they can beat it in the same amount of time. Battle to earn XP so you can level up and score awesome virtual goods.

DOZENS OF TRACKS – WITH MORE ADDED EVERY WEEK FOR FREE!
Mad Skills Motocross 2 has enough content to keep you busy for years. Beat the stock opponent on dozens of career tracks, and then see if you can beat the Ace to unlock more tracks. Once you’ve Aced them all, take on your friends, neighbors, and players all over the world. You can even follow real-life professional motocross racers – almost all of them play Mad Skills – and take on their best times.

WEEKLY COMPETITIONS!
Mad Skills Motocross 2 features an online competition called JAM, which pits you against fellow players across the world on new tracks every week. JAM will likely be one of the most addicting experiences you’ve ever had on your mobile device.

CUSTOMIZABLE BIKES AND RIDERS 
Change the color of your bike and your rider’s gear, and add your favorite number to your bike’s number plate. If you’re fast enough, you can even earn a virtual Red Bull helmet to let your friends know you rule!

AND MORE!

Optional rockets to help you past difficult levels and competitors

Universal application. Connect with Facebook, Twitter or Google Play and your game progress and purchases will sync between devices.

Beautiful settings that are HD optimized for an amazing gameplay experience.

See the official trailer here: www.madskillsmx.com/trailer

Like Mad Skills Motocross 2 at www.facebook.com/madskillsmotocross
Follow Mad Skills Motocross 2 at www.twitter.com/madskillsmx and www.instagram.com/madskillsmx

IMPORTANT NOTE: While this app is free to download and play, there are some items in the game that cost real money. Also, Mad Skills Motocross 2 links to social networks that are intended for an audience over the age of 13. This game includes advertising of Turborilla products and products from select partners.

comments: I enjoy this lifetime favorite with people worldwide, and Uno Dare is my most favorite mode. I understand it will be discontinued in June and I wish it wasn't so.    ...Hey Uno & Friends, could you please not ask me to rate an app I've already rated??? I was asked to read it again and then I came back to find I had made that specific request not to ask me to re-rate something. Your app needs to be reprogrammed so it knows if someone has rated it or not. (sigh)

Tokens take too long to refill. Level up gives a few coins, why not a token refill? Tournament champion gets 4 tokens. 7 tokens for a day? Cheapskates! When do you want us to play, every 5 days? So cheap in giving prizes, guessing you want us to buy eh? I'll give myself a few weeks playing this game and am out. No daily prize wheel, just a daily "less than 20 coins" reward. Sooooooo cheap!

It's just ok.  Hard to see your entire hand at times and some of the rules are different than the actual UNO game itself. When I contacted this apps tech support, they sounded as if they could care less and said they will not be making any changes to the game.  So I play until they want me to buy credits then I stop.  When they give me more free credits I play again.  I like the game UNO, just not this one so much.  Why do I still play?  Hmmm, that's a good question.

Greatest game ever~~¬§mean it.  The Updated game even better.  Need to be easier to play with Friends that you JUST made ~~maybe REPLAY!!!  üò¨ üò≤ üò† üòê üò≠  Friends where are you? Great for tablets.   I am UNO happy . Happy New years  .Oh don't terminate the game unless you just have to, I well try finding something other to do. Nothing Good ever lasts anyway.   Thanks for reading.  UNO POWER.

LOVE! Please DO NOT end the game! This app is perfect all the way around. Best card game app ever. SOOO many people are gonna be upset if you take it down, so leave it up! These uno players are ready to rock this app! You will never not have people playing. It would be kind of cool if you could create your own avatar though.. & pick outfits and such. Not necessary, but a fun little quirk (:

Classic UNO with a couple of modern twists and turns. I have never spent any real money in a game and I don't ever plan to, but here you also don't really need to. I've won many tournaments and got really far in the game without buying anything. You get extra coins by winning and completing daily tasks, as well as watching ads. But you're not forced to watch them. It's not just about luck. You have to play smart to win, just like any other card game. I love it.

descriptionHTML:
UNO™ & Friends: Fast Fun for Everyone!

UNO™, the world's most beloved card game, introduces a new free social experience!

Playing UNO™ with friends, family, and the millions of fans worldwide has never been easier! Join one of the largest mobile gaming communities and enjoy a free multiplayer experience, brand-new game modes and tournaments that let you shout ""UNO!"" on a whole new level!

GAME FEATURES:

√ Easy to learn, difficult to put down!
√ Play in Tournaments and become an UNO champion!
√ Team up for the win in 2vs2 UNO!
√ Use Boosts & Companions to diversify your strategy!
√ Level up your UNO Companions and unleash their powers!
√ Create custom games and invite your friends to play!
√ Challenge millions of UNO fans worldwide!

_____________________________________________

You can download and play this game for free. Please be informed that it also allows you to play using virtual currency, which can be acquired as you progress through the game, or by deciding to watch certain advertisements, or by paying with real money. Purchases of virtual currency using real money are performed using a credit card, or other form of payment associated with your account, and are activated when you input your Google Play account password, without the need to re-enter your credit card number or PIN.
In-app purchases can be restricted by adjusting the authentication settings within your Play Store settings (Google Play Store Home > Settings > Require authentication for purchases) and setting up a password for each purchase / Every 30 minutes or Never.
Disabling password protection may result in unauthorized purchases. We strongly encourage you to keep password protection turned on if you have children or if others could have access to your device.
This game contains advertising for Gameloft’s products or some third parties which will redirect you to a third-party site. You can disable your device’s ad identifier being used for interest-based advertising in the settings menu of your device. This option can be found in the Settings app > Accounts (Personal) > Google > Ads (Settings and Privacy) > Opt out of interest-based ads.
Certain aspects of this game will require the player to connect to the Internet.
___________________________________

descriptionHTML:
Run to chase after the robber and explore the endless running worlds of Talking Tom Gold Run!
Race to catch the fun with loads of FREE CHARACTERS and the SPECIAL NEW CHARACTER, PRINCESS ANGELA! She lives in a magical place called MEDIEVAL TOWN. So, get ready to go for the gold in this exciting SIDE WORLD.

Or test your snowboarding skills in the Snowboard Side World! Race snowboards on the snow! Rule the slopes! And have endless fun playing one of the best infinite runners out there!

Whether you’re a kid, or just young at heart, this cool game will have you running, jumping, and getting an EPIC ADRENALINE RUSH IN NO TIME AT ALL!

★ Get a rush as you run through the subway tunnel to the new side world, Medieval Town.
★ Race down the slopes and ride the halfpipe on your new snowboard – it’s super cool!!!
★ Meet special guest star, Princess Angela, and spend the winter with your favorite characters, Talking Tom, Talking Angela, Talking Hank, Talking Ben, and Talking Ginger!

GET READY, GET SET, RUN!! Come and have fun for free with this amazing endless runner! Chase after the robber who stole your gold and unlock new worlds. Do you have what it takes to run through all the worlds and win? It’s not super easy to be the best, but we believe in you! Start running and racing now. It’s time to go for gold!

Run to chase the robber – he’s got your gold! Use the gold bars you get back to build and upgrade amazing homes for Talking Tom and Friends! The finished homes will then unlock new worlds just for you! So, what are you waiting for? Let’s run for fun this winter!

★★★ENJOY THE FUN OF TALKING TOM GOLD RUN★★★
ENDLESS FUN: With endless running, racing, and snowboarding, the fun never ends!!!
MISSIONS AND REWARDS: Win missions to get cool rewards!
BUILD AMAZING HOMES: Use the gold bars you collect to build homes for Talking Tom and Friends!
UNLOCK NEW RUNNING WORLDS: Explore even more fun worlds when you upgrade your home!
RUN WITH SPECIAL CHARACTERS: Run even faster and do cool tricks with the help of special characters!

PLAY FOR FREE!

This app contains:
The possibility to use and connect with friends via social networks;
The option to make in-app purchases;
Alternative options to access all functionalities of the app without making any in-app purchases using real money (build progress, in-game functionalities, etc.);
Promotions for Outfit7’s products, as well as advertising;
Items to purchase (available in different prices) using virtual currency, depending on the player’s progress;
Videos to watch starring Outfit7’s animated characters via YouTube integration; and
Links that direct customers to Outfit7’s websites and other apps.

This app is PRIVO certified. The PRIVO safe harbor seal indicates that Outfit7 has established COPPA-compliant privacy practices to protect the personal information of children. Our apps do not allow younger children to share their information.

Terms of use: http://outfit7.com/eula/
Privacy policy: http://outfit7.com/privacy-policy/
Customer support: support@outfit7.com

comments: Played this on PC, and really enjoyed it for its simple, quirky playstyle. While it does trail off at the end when you've mastered everything, the entertainment value is still strong. Particularly like going back to this title every now and again for a no-pressure, casual simulation game. Surprisingly, Game Dev Tycoon is pretty smooth on mobile, so kudos to the devs!

Just gave this game 5 star everything. When this game first came out on PC I couldn't afford it, so I pirated it. Sorry Greenheart! Now I have the chance to purchase your game and I'm glad I have. I know I'm going to play this for hours on end. It is definitely the best indie game I've ever played. Looking forward to your next project Greenheart!!

Loving the game! Not sure where else to try to contact the devs, but I am having an issue. My auto save is from Year 15. I am currently in year 22, and so is my manual save. However, whenever I try to load my manual save, it only takes me back to the year 15 autosave. I know it's just a game but it's pretty upsetting to not be able to access that lost progress, so any tips or response would be awesome. Great game!

It's good. 80 hours on PC version. This has some extra bits. Just want to support Dev, but am looking forward to playing it more on phone. Haven't had a bug yet either. Controls are great, they really lended themselves to mobile!

Played for days on the PC version. This one is just like it, except in the palm of your hands. No micro transactions, coins, or loot boxes. One price for the full game. Amazing!  In Game Dev Tycoon, you make games and build a company to from your parents garage, to a fully fledged AAA Studio. The controls are awesome. Your first games will be tests to how and what gamers like. You'll develop games for real life hardware (with names changed for licensing issues). Eventually, when you get to late game, you can create your own console and compete with other companies, releasing exclusive titles of your own, and dominating the market share.   You'll easily lose if you're not careful with your finances, but the game is so addicting that you'll keep coming back to it. Like I did.

I don't ever rate games, but this one deserves it. Only been playing an hour and I love it. I'm already excited to start over and try things differently. Totally worth the money and I highly suggest this for any sim fans. Great time killer as well. Good job guys.

descriptionHTML:
Welcome to Game Dev Tycoon. In this business simulation game you start your own game development company in the 80s. Create best selling games, research new technologies to boost your business and invent new game types. Become the leader of the market and gain worldwide fans.

Create games your way
Your success depends on your creativity and willingness to experiment. What topics and genres go well together? Should your Action game focus more on engine optimization or on quest design? The decisions you make during the development of your games will have a major impact on the ratings you receive.

Grow your company
Once you have successfully released a few games you can move into your own office and forge a world-class development team. Hire staff, train them and unlock new options.

Features
🕹 Start a game development company in the 80s
✍ Design and create games
💡 Gain new insights through game reports
👁 Research new technologies
⚙ Create custom game engines
🏢 Move into bigger offices
👩🏽‍💻 Forge a world-class development team
🔬 Unlock secret labs
📈 Become a market leader
💚 Gain worldwide fans
🥇 Unlock achievements

The full game has many more features which are not listed here to prevent spoilers.

The mobile version introduces
☠ A super-difficult (but optional) pirate mode
📰 An updated storyline
👩‍🍳 New topics for even more varied games
📱 New UI optimized for phones and tablets

A game with 💚
Game Dev Tycoon does not contain any in-app purchases or ads and you can play it without an internet connection. Enjoy!

comments: It's an OK game with pretty complex party building mechanics. But, it also has terrible progression that almost pushes you to spend cash if you're not patient.    And the controls...  For a mobile game, the controls is not very responsive, sometimes I decided to drag a character to attack and the game decided to instead move the character forward and switches with the front unit, in a game where formation matters, this breaks the whole system, and so in order to prevent that, you'll have to drag it slowly, so it registers properly   The hit box is also pretty terrible, sometimes I decided to attack but then it didn't register because I didn't hit the right hit box.   Overall the game itself is not bad, but it has slow progression and getting the 5* (which is very necessary especially the raid class item) is very hard, definitely play this game if you are a very patient person.
Problems solved. Thank you
I give this a 5. I'm F2P and the ??

It's can be fun game(for a short)if you are not interested in the competitive aspect. If you want to be competitive you gotta spend a lot of real money because of prestige.Prestige xa give you additionnal stats to your unit.  You need to spend more than 800$ to have every stats bonus only avaible with prestige. You can gain a few prestige every year but they increase the prestige cap faster.  Pvp is boring, from bronze to silver all i had to do is put a tank on capture point to win. And now i have been losing 95% of all of my matches in gold( and i cant fall back i silver even if i only losses)  Guild arent interesting if you arent super powerfull as you do 0.1% of what a big player does.  It takes a long time to even be somewhat strong.  Pve is ok but really short if its the only thing you do.

This game can be spendy but even without buying anything, you can still advance quickly. There are known bugs but it is address very quickly. I definitely enjoy the gameplay and involvement of the whole community to grow your team.

Normally, I don't give freemium pay to win games 5 stars, but this one is different. Basically all the money options are crazily overpriced, but if you put the time in they give you tons of premium currency just for playing. I've been playing for awhile and it hasn't slowed down yet. I just wish they had a decently priced option because I'd like to support the developers, but there isn't really a good option, monetarily, to do that. Everything cheap is lackluster and anything worthwhile is expensive.    If you like tactics games this game can definitely holds your attention for awhile.
description: Valiant Force, the highly-anticipated mobile strategy RPG (role-playing game), is finally here! Forming teams from over 200 unique heroes and 40 diverse jobs, players are tasked to explore the vast and dangerous world of Arathos to save its inhabitants from an awakening evil. Embark on an epic adventure in Valiant Force now!KEY GAME FEATURES‚òÜ Turn-based strategy RPGTest your strategic skills on the classic 3x6 grid battlefield. Move your heroes to the right positions, and trigger each hero's aura. Become a true master of tactical combat!‚òÜ 40+ specialized jobs, 200+ unique heroesValiant Force offers a variety of specialized  jobs and heroes to choose from. Form your team and choose your paths!‚òÜ 500+ items to craft and collectPower up your heroes with different rarities of equipment obtained from dungeon loot or crafted using materials. There are over 500 different items to collect!‚òÜ Epic boss eventsFace off against the most terrifying boss monsters found in Valiant Force in special boss event dungeons. Awesome loot awaits!‚òÜ Build and upgrade your GarrisonBuild your garrison to buff heroes, send them on expeditions, get more gold, gems, experience points, and much more. With limited land, choose your structures wisely!‚òÜ PVP ArenaTest you mantle and squad strength in the PVP arena! Climb up the rankings in the most intense strategy-based PVP system ever, and become a true tactician of the battlefield!‚òÜ Rune SystemStrengthen your heroes using the grid-based Rune System. Mix and match the runes which will aid your hero during battles. Unique unlockable passive skills await!‚òÜ Guild SystemGather your friends and families to form guilds! Exclusive features and bonuses awaits all guild member, with more features in development.‚òÜ Audio masterpieceImmerse in Valiant Force's music, composed by former Square Enix veteran, Mr Hitoshi Sakimoto and Basiscape.‚òÜ Visual masterpieceStunning 2D art drawn in-house at XII Braves, along with detailed 3D modelsComing soon:- New heroes- New items- New maps- New Conquest mode... and more!Connect with us on social media!Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/ValiantForce/Copyright ¬© 2016 XII Braves and FunPlus. descriptionHTML:
Valiant Force, the highly-anticipated mobile strategy RPG (role-playing game), is finally here! Forming teams from over 200 unique heroes and 40 diverse jobs, players are tasked to explore the vast and dangerous world of Arathos to save its inhabitants from an awakening evil. Embark on an epic adventure in Valiant Force now!

KEY GAME FEATURES

☆ Turn-based strategy RPG
Test your strategic skills on the classic 3x6 grid battlefield. Move your heroes to the right positions, and trigger each hero's aura. Become a true master of tactical combat!

☆ 40+ specialized jobs, 200+ unique heroes
Valiant Force offers a variety of specialized jobs and heroes to choose from. Form your team and choose your paths!

☆ 500+ items to craft and collect
Power up your heroes with different rarities of equipment obtained from dungeon loot or crafted using materials. There are over 500 different items to collect!

☆ Epic boss events
Face off against the most terrifying boss monsters found in Valiant Force in special boss event dungeons. Awesome loot awaits!

☆ Build and upgrade your Garrison
Build your garrison to buff heroes, send them on expeditions, get more gold, gems, experience points, and much more. With limited land, choose your structures wisely!

☆ PVP Arena
Test you mantle and squad strength in the PVP arena! Climb up the rankings in the most intense strategy-based PVP system ever, and become a true tactician of the battlefield!

☆ Rune System
Strengthen your heroes using the grid-based Rune System. Mix and match the runes which will aid your hero during battles. Unique unlockable passive skills await!

☆ Guild System
Gather your friends and families to form guilds! Exclusive features and bonuses awaits all guild member, with more features in development.

☆ Audio masterpiece
Immerse in Valiant Force's music, composed by former Square Enix veteran, Mr Hitoshi Sakimoto and Basiscape.

☆ Visual masterpiece
Stunning 2D art drawn in-house at XII Braves, along with detailed 3D models

Coming soon:

- New heroes
- New items
- New maps
- New Conquest mode
... and more!

Connect with us on social media!

Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/ValiantForce/


Copyright © 2016 XII Braves and FunPlus. All Rights Reserved.

comments: Had to delete game due to ads popping up when I unlock phone.  If it wasn't for the ad issue, might played longer. It was getting tiresome going down to mine, a cave somewhere in the middle to find to restart a mission, then back to the top to smelt/craft. Then you have the auto mining platforms that are movable but one wrong touch and it resets.   Graphics were great.  There are other game like this, that don't spam ads during nongame play, that are equal or better
Hey wonderful game! Except that I might have broken it...killed the Amber Elder before crafting tesla coil.
its insane how much you have to pay for upgrading digging tools,, uninstallig it after a year playing, sad but true
Nice idle clicker. Nothing too hard or complicated. Just fun to login a couple times a day and waste 5 min of your time

Game takes longer and longer to load with every update: I'm at the point that I fire up the game and have to wait 10 minutes plus until I can actually play. Works fine after, but getting tiresome. As is the really pointless nuclear reactor that takes months to fuel for one short run. Weapon upgrades now stupid requirements - latest needs more obsidian than I've mined in over a year.... Get a grip on reality people!

One word - archeology. On your digging journey - find caves and send explorer bots to see what's inside, uncover the hidden story behind your planet's past, and answer the age long question - where are we?

comments: I love this game! Its BEYOND ADDICTIVE! This is a "slot," which appeals to those who also enjoy a nether-universe of of scifi/fantasu. Its visually appealing, as well as, fun!!!! An AWESOME SITE!!!

Yes it looks and sounds amazing. But short of that, this slot game is completely unremarkable. Just like every other slot game out there, wins are few and far between. The hourly bonus is weak aswel. When you're at a level that requires you to max bet (25000000 or more) and you win 1000000 on the hour bonus and have nothing in the credit meter due to the lack of free spins and no bonuses, it becomes very frustrating. comments: Finally a mobile mmo that actually feels like a real mmorpg. Nice graphics, skills, open world questing, lots of players. Fights are engaging  and boss fights are spectacular and interactive. You do need a team for dungeons and raids as you can't just 1 shot everything, like in other mobile mmos. I've tried loads but this is the best by far! Keep it up!

Man, this is a perfect 5/7! Out of a crapton of Mu Origin game clones, this is even better than original! Polished graphics, nice player skills set, awesome UI items layout - everything is top notch! The only thing I can wish for is adding camera turn on top of player strafe via joystick. Thanks for the hard work, and please keep it up!

Great mobile MMO! Good graphics and narration so the story stays interesting. Additionally...SO much Co-op and PvP and a lot of things to give an edge. Not P2P dominated either so far. Obviously the grind to 55 is tough but I have a few characters on different servers there still very possible.

I think this game is amazing for an MMO mobile. It has a feeling of blade and soul and WOW and the graphics sre amazing on my Razer phone! Actually feels like a real MMO, and I like that there are character voices.  Only problem I am having is whenever I go to turn the Volume up or down all sound cuts out and won't come back on until i restart the game. So I need to pre-set my volume before launching the game and then not touch the volume while playing.

Love this games good graphic and updated.  But love warrior in any game but in this game warrior are weak in dps. Can u adjust skill  And i spend real money on top up every week but no legend reforge from bp.  How sad to my char. Legend are to far away to me full set legend. I play evryday not to miss anything on event

Overall game nya seru, story lore nya juga, banyak diversity dalam 1 class, hal yg bikin menarik sebenernya banyak hal yg bisa di laku in di game, ga selama nya soal "power character" tapi soal balancing stat sesuai kebutuhan dan juga path yg diambil. sistem dungeon yg berbeda difficulty juga seru a.k.a mythic (jadi inget main world of warcraft), tapi somehow sistem pvp kurang greget 4.5/5

After the last update I started having problem with game interface. I always played this game in left hand interface but now I need to change the interface before each and every hunt. The worst is even if I change the interface to left handed before a dual the game automatically changed the interface to right hand. And after a dual starts there is no way to access the setting to change to left hand. Please fix it! It's like forcing a left handed person to write with his right hand. I don't play duals anymore because of this problem. And I know if I don't play duals I won't get anywhere in this game. Be considerate please and fix it

I love this game and the graphics are really neat but, there are a few bugs that seriously need of fixing. For starters, when I'm in the middle of a duel, it will straight up just kick me off and it will exit the game completely...its very frustrating. Second, why when someone is doing the duel, the opponent gets an extra 20 seconds to complete it?? I have won so many duels but since they get an extra 20 seconds, they tend to beat me when clearly I was ahead when the duel was actually over...please fix this. I really do love this game but it needs debugged to be a badass game.
It would be better if you could walk. Around instead of being in one spot and only able to look left and right. Other than that it's a good way to kill time.

comments: I'm a big mahjong player and this game is like mahjong on crack. i definitely recommend it to my fellow mahjong nerds. it's awesome with how many levels there are and boosters and achievements and the whole shebang. not just a regular mahjong game where you can only play the game and nothing more. if you like the whole saving up crystals and buying boosters and earning achievements jawn, then you'll love this game. side note, I also have not spent real life money on this game mostly because I don't need to. I usually will buy stuff for games only because I use the money I get from my Google rewards app cause that money goes straight into my Google play account. so it's not that I'm anti spending money on games, but I haven't yet felt like I needed to. it's not one of those where you need to spend money to have it be fun at all (well, not yet anyway! hopefully that won't change) or to be able to get past a certain point. so I totally recommend this to all my mahjong nerd brothers and sisters!

It is a shame that this game allows one to start a new mod and a day or two later sends the player back to the original mod to collect hats, lanterns or eggs. A more polite end to an uncompleted game would be "Try Again!" rather than "You lose!" This the most rude end that I have seen on any of these games.

So far its good! Just wish you would not link all your games like you do it bogs the games down. And wish you would fix it so that if you had a game several years ago in which you used your email address you could reuse it even if you can't remember your password

A different spin on the classic MahJong game. It's fast-paced  and sometimes it doesn't respond as quick as I  would like. I wish the game would allow just a little more time because it is difficult to see the different levels to find all the matching tiles.

I love this game. However I do have problems with the loading. It says there is no internet connection which is not true. I have fast ADSL and it is connected all the time. Why don't I have problems with other games then? They all work perfectly. Please look into this matter. Thanking you.

I paid 1.99 for 40 eggs and game earned the other 5... and the "unique prize" was 5 gems.... I would think it would be something a little more...idk just more. Other than that, the game is awesome. Love the whole idea. Levels, like any other of the "saga" games with mahjong.

descriptionHTML:
Celebrate Spring with our limited-time offers!

Embark on a magical journey in this addictive Mahjong Solitaire adventure!

Enjoy a new take on Mahjong Shanghai as you help a young girl and her grandfather traverse the globe in search of her lost parents. Make your way by pairing tiles in order to dismantle hundreds of layouts. Collect achievements for special accomplishments while taking advantage of innovative gameplay twists like Shuffle, which allows you to get out of a difficult situation, or Firecracker, a tool for blowing up multiple pairs of tiles. Visit the Forbidden City, Virupaksha Temple, the Taj Mahal and the famous Mount Fuji as you fulfill challenging quests and earn gold stars for completing levels as fast as you can!

While this game is absolutely free to play, you have the ability to unlock optional bonuses via in-app purchases from within the game. You may disable in-app purchases in your device settings.

● Master over 1100 immersive levels (with hundreds more coming in free updates)
● Match 1134 types of tiles in 27 different tile sets (with more coming in free updates)
● Earn over 40 desirable achievements and utilize four groundbreaking power-ups
● Enjoy gorgeous graphics, rich sounds and regular free updates with new levels, tile sets and more
● Google Play game services support

comments: An absolutely wonderful game. Even better then Hearthstone if you ask me. It's so good that even I, Solaire of Astora who hails from Dark Souls, absolutely praises this game. 100% recommend. This only issue that one could run into is lag, but this is only due to the fact that I have an older phone. I'm sure that if you have a better phone, this game would be EVEN better. Praise the Sun \[T]/

Elder scrolls legends is a game with a elder scrolls taste and mechanics. Its choices, game modes and progress systems works perfect. It's story is great, and serve as a tutorial for the big part of the game. You can even unlock new dlc and decks through your progress in the game. This is truly a marvelous game. Problems like connection break occurs very rare and does not affect the game. If you like CCG and ELDER SCROLLS, then this game is highly recommended.

Hands down one of the best card games I have ever played. The gameplay is simplistic yet emersive. The different combinations of cards and deck types you can build is vast allowing you to adapt to any challenge you may encounter. While the gameplay is phenomenal, it's very easy to gain an understanding of how to play and the cards themselves. Bethesda has yet again made a game that has captivated me. Well done üëç

The first three turns of the game has an incredibly small amount of finite moves.  You wouldn't know this because the typical player will take more than 30 seconds on their first, second, and third turns.  You start to realize that on "draft" games, you will benefit more if you concede the game when your opponent is taking an agonisingly long time on the first few turns because they're putting so much thought into the only play in their hand.

Week 1: *Going to try to make this an ongoing review*. Had to lower this to 4 stars overall, because you have to either pay or grind to access all of story mode. I'm gonna buy it, but I think it shouldn't cost more than $14.99. Just mho. PvP is fun and you actually play LIVE people, not an AI running someone's cards. Level rewards seem generous and worthwhile.  Runs a bit slow, but I know it's my phone and not the app's fault. Gameplay is very fluid and makes sense. I already like it FAR BETTER than Hearthstone.

Fun game! Is very generous with card packs and rewards. Plenty of deck complexity yet easy to get into. The RnG can be troublesome at times, but I guess that's just how card games go. Would definitely recommend if you enjoy card games, specially if you're and Elder Scrolls fan.

descriptionHTML:
The Elder Scrolls®: Legends™ - Heroes of Skyrim

"The first real challenge to the CCG throne." - Shacknews

Built for skill, not chance, The Elder Scrolls®: Legends™ - Heroes of Skyrim is a strategy card game based on the world and lore of the award-winning Elder Scrolls series.

Enter the world of Skyrim, full of formidable dragons and fan-favorite characters and heroes. Play for hours or minutes across many card battle game modes that are easy to learn but challenging to master. Battle against opponents in challenging card games, and examine the arena to come up with a strategy that will end in your victory.

Enjoy card collecting combined with intense multiplayer PVP card games. Collect cards and level up your existing deck heroes to take on even more challenging opponents. Can you survive the world of Skyrim?

The Elder Scrolls®: Legends™ - Heroes of Skyrim Features:

PLAY RPG CARD GAMES ON YOUR OWN
- Strategy card games – Learn the best strategy for winning card battles in Story Mode.
- Earn legendary heroes, Legends cards, decks, and packs when you play solo.
- Draft battle decks from scratch and battle a series of computer opponents.

ONLINE PVP AGAINST OTHER PLAYERS
- Multiplayer games let you test your deck strength against friends.
- Online PVP games – Challenge online opponents in ranked play.
- Draft battle decks from scratch and battle other players who have done the same.

PICK YOUR CARD BATTLES
- Expand strategy options with Legends gameplay, which features a divided battlefield with “lanes.”
- Card strategy – Carefully place your cards in either lane to attack your opponent and their cards.
- Strategy is key – Make sure you’re prepared for whatever your opponent plays next.

LEVEL UP BATTLE CARDS
- Crafted battle – Collect cards and tailor your deck to your play style.
- Deck heroes and other cards can be upgraded by winning games against decks that contain the same card.
- Level up battle cards to improve your decks and give yourself more flexibility.

MONTHLY CCG UPDATES
- Why play a strategy card game if It doesn’t change? Add a new card to your deck every month.
- Trading card game constant updates to keep the meta-game fresh and interesting keeps the game fresh and competitive.

Explore the world of Skyrim and battle challenging opponents in intense card games. Discover the best card game strategy, and add legendary heroes and fan-favorite characters to your battle decks in The Elder Scrolls®: Legends™ - Heroes of Skyrim.

Download now and play multiplayer card games.
developerAddress:
Bethesda Softworks LLC
1370 Piccard Drive, Suite 120
Rockville, MD 28050
recentChanges: Deckbuilder
Previously, the number of decks you could have at one time in the Deckbuilder was limited to 35. That has been expanded to 50 decks.
Bug Fixes
‚Ä¢	Balmora Spymaster no longer gives negative stats and costs to some cards (such as Ancient Giant).
‚Ä¢	Embassy Disguise no longer gives Cover to a Guard.
‚Ä¢	Time is Running Out! has improved wording in non-English languages.
‚Ä¢	The ongoing Skeleton buff from Bone Colossus is now properly removed when the Colossus leaves play.
summary: RPG card game where the heroes of Skyrim battle it out in a strategy card game.
title: The Elder Scrolls: Legends

description: League of War: Mercenaries is an exciting war strategy game where you can make choices that have real impact and outcomes. Immerse yourself in this 3D war game to build your base, grow your army, and battle your way to victory.3D battlefield mixed with a unique tug of war deck-based combat system, giving you an exciting tactical war strategy game that will keep you playing for days! Build a fighting force of extraordinary magnitude to wage war on corporations and nations. descriptionHTML:
League of War: Mercenaries is an exciting war strategy game where you can make choices that have real impact and outcomes. Immerse yourself in this 3D war game to build your base, grow your army, and battle your way to victory.

3D battlefield mixed with a unique tug of war deck-based combat system, giving you an exciting tactical war strategy game that will keep you playing for days! Build a fighting force of extraordinary magnitude to wage war on corporations and nations. Take on hundreds of missions or compete with fellow Mercenaries to claim victory around the globe and enjoy the spoils of war!

In League of War: Mercenaries, players act as mercenaries, taking on military contractors that play out on the battlefield to claim victory around the globe. Upgrade your army with futuristic tech, battle your enemies, and come out on top in this tactical war.

= LEAGUE OF WAR: MERCENARIES FEATURES =

3D GAME - EXPERIENCE A LUSH 3D BATTLEFIELD
★ Battle your way through stunning 3D content, from your military headquarters to intensely fast-paced combat!
★ 3D war visuals with stunning, visceral combat that plays out in real time

WAR STRATEGY - YOUR CHOICES HAVE AN IMPACT
★ Build and strengthen your army with tanks, helicopters, infantries and more.
★ Strategize the units you use to ensure your victory on the battlefield
★ Advanced warfare tech will help you dominate your enemies and rule the planet
★ Strategy and tactics will make your army the strongest

REAL TIME STRATEGY COMBAT – UPDATE TACTICS IN REAL TIME
★ Tactical wars have enveloped the world. Battle for control in intense RTS combat!
★ RTS games challenge you to strategically configure and prepare your squad in a variety ways to counter sophisticated enemy units
★ Real time strategy combat challenges you to always stay one step ahead of your enemy

BASE BUILDING - EXPAND & UPGRADE MILITARY HEADQUARTERS
★ Build and upgrade the ultimate military HQ with sophisticated base building tools
★ Defend your base by leveling up your military fortress
★ Building games lovers will really enjoy this fast paced, action packed RTS

AMRY UPGRADES – BUILD A BETTER MILITARY
★ Armies are upgradeable so you can always utilize new tactics
★ Tanks, aircraft and more are at your disposal as you clash with enemies

UPGRADE MERCENARIES - CUSTOMIZE MILITARY UNITS
★ Upgrade & equip units with a vast array of technology for specific roles to defeat your enemy!
★ Build your army, from tanks to infantry, and put a personal stamp on your mercenaries
★ Mercenaries grow stronger as you gain new tech and tactics

ALLIANCE BUILDING - FORGE STRATEGIC ALLIANCES
★ Alliances let you bring your military might down on enemies
★ Online multiplayer - Create an Alliance and band together against enemy for powerful rewards!
★ Play with friends! Join your friends for deeper engagements and battle together

MULTIPLAYER MODE - TEST YOUR STRATEGY IN 2 PLAYER BATTLES
★ Defend your base and battle to be the best!
★ Multiplayer war breaks out across the world. Will you come out on top?
★ PVP combat challenges you to earn valuable loot by defeating fellow players in head-to-head battle!

Defense and offense are critical – which strategy will you use to conquer the world?

Battle to conquer the world with advanced warfare tactics and a powerful army of infantry, tanks and helicopters. Combat multiplayer opponents in PVP strategy games, build the ultimate base and lead your team of mercenaries to global domination.

Download League of War: Mercenaries and become King of the mercenaries!

description: Found your own Motorcycle Club in Bloody Roads, California:Chopper, Biker and dirty streets, that is what awaits you in Bloody Roads, California. Found your own Motorcycle Club (MC) and drive around, terrifying the neighborhood and get the district under your control. In Bloody Roads, California you become a merciless outlaw, who not only loves his bike but loves having power as well. Play with strategic thinking and tactic to get the best out of the game and always be one step ahead of other players to reach your goals.Of bikers and outlaws ‚Äì the story:Back then, three years ago, I was making good business, mainly firearms. A bit of extortion, a couple girls. All on a pretty good scale. In those days, I had it all! But then I got too careless and the ATF raided my crib. Luckily, they didn‚Äôt have too much evidence against me. Still, that mess brought me three years in Rikers Island. During a yard exercise, a guy tried to knife the President of the Bastards of Hell MC. Usually, of course, the first rules in the slammer are: Don‚Äôt see, don‚Äôt listen, don‚Äôt tell. And most importantly, don‚Äôt get involved. But the MC guys were honest types. I guess that was why I didn‚Äôt just turn my head. Now the Club owed me. I guess I could a joined the MC, but I preferred doing my own thing. Still, the whole appearance of these guys really impressed me. Three years later I am finally a free man again and the clink did not tame me one bit. However, it is time to start something new. Ever since I can imagine I loved living my freedom on my chopper. My bike always was more to me than just a vehicle. So founding my own motorcycle club and painting the streets red with my fellas ever since felt natural. Together we keep the streets free of those who think can mess with us. That‚Äôs what you ought to do:Just out of jail and free again but with your own district now that you can manage from underground it is your duty to start your career as a gangster anew and found your own mc club. Your goal must be to expand the Motorcycle Club (MC) and rule the district with the help of your biker friends. Earn money, expand your influence and attack and rob other players in game. But watch out! The cops got their eyes everywhere so always remember to briber them and be sure that they keep their eyes shut and stay out of your business. With fortunes and tactic you‚Äôll be the king of the road and rule them with merciless severity.In game Features:Bloody Roads, California is a strategy and building game, that asks for strategic thinking, fortunes and tactic. These are the features you get in the game and that will keep you entertained and on the edge of your seat for hours.‚Ä¢	Found your very own MC‚Ä¢	Fight against bikers from other players in merciless streetwars‚Ä¢	Get onto your chopper and built up your own empire‚Ä¢	Earn money by running tattoo studios, bars and other establishments, to expand and built up your MC‚Ä¢	Train your bikers to keep your business going.‚Ä¢	Have a blast with this multiplayer strategy game
descriptionHTML:
Found your own Motorcycle Club in Bloody Roads, California:

Chopper, Biker and dirty streets, that is what awaits you in Bloody Roads, California. Found your own Motorcycle Club (MC) and drive around, terrifying the neighborhood and get the district under your control. In Bloody Roads, California you become a merciless outlaw, who not only loves his bike but loves having power as well. Play with strategic thinking and tactic to get the best out of the game and always be one step ahead of other players to reach your goals.


Of bikers and outlaws – the story:

Back then, three years ago, I was making good business, mainly firearms. A bit of extortion, a couple girls. All on a pretty good scale. In those days, I had it all! But then I got too careless and the ATF raided my crib. Luckily, they didn’t have too much evidence against me. Still, that mess brought me three years in Rikers Island. During a yard exercise, a guy tried to knife the President of the Bastards of Hell MC. Usually, of course, the first rules in the slammer are: Don’t see, don’t listen, don’t tell. And most importantly, don’t get involved. But the MC guys were honest types. I guess that was why I didn’t just turn my head. Now the Club owed me. I guess I could a joined the MC, but I preferred doing my own thing. Still, the whole appearance of these guys really impressed me.
Three years later I am finally a free man again and the clink did not tame me one bit. However, it is time to start something new. Ever since I can imagine I loved living my freedom on my chopper. My bike always was more to me than just a vehicle. So founding my own motorcycle club and painting the streets red with my fellas ever since felt natural. Together we keep the streets free of those who think can mess with us.


That’s what you ought to do:

Just out of jail and free again but with your own district now that you can manage from underground it is your duty to start your career as a gangster anew and found your own mc club. Your goal must be to expand the Motorcycle Club (MC) and rule the district with the help of your biker friends. Earn money, expand your influence and attack and rob other players in game. But watch out! The cops got their eyes everywhere so always remember to briber them and be sure that they keep their eyes shut and stay out of your business.
With fortunes and tactic you’ll be the king of the road and rule them with merciless severity.

In game Features:

Bloody Roads, California is a strategy and building game, that asks for strategic thinking, fortunes and tactic. These are the features you get in the game and that will keep you entertained and on the edge of your seat for hours.

• Found your very own MC
• Fight against bikers from other players in merciless streetwars
• Get onto your chopper and built up your own empire
• Earn money by running tattoo studios, bars and other establishments, to expand and built up your MC
• Train your bikers to keep your business going.
• Have a blast with this multiplayer strategy game

comments: I've tried many TD so far still playing this one..every level in every map is unique..  its cool how I can pick and lvl Heroes but then it takes awhile to add a new one when running out of gems (since gems are needed for Heroes) unless u pay to keep playing or just to wait for tournaments... it takes patience lol but I don't mind playing again

A great game with unique map designs and user friendly controls, free to play if you have patience and play strategically, pay to win if you want to advance faster. It is especially a good game for busy people like me who can only spend 10-15 minutes per day but need to stay in the game for a large number of days to be competitive. Don't try to use items and gems on every maps, it is fun and challenging to clear them without shortcuts. *Tip for developers*: Instead of giving purchase options for Sethos and Phoenix they could go with Yan and Narlax, gives chance for new players to compete also developers can milk in additional purchases.

Great TD game with decent difficulty and NPCs progression while still maintining a pattern making you work to figure out various strategies.  Ads have never been an issue I honestly cant remember where they are.  I think they may only be for like "double your rewards for battle" kind of thing.  90% (A) or better in my oppinion.  Mainly cause I want to see more progression.  Note I am only a few levels in so I dont know if theres a pay to get by an immpassable place yet.
*Updated* SCAM! Games slowly bleeds away your gems without mechanics being apparent. (I lost 300 gems in the last 3 days) Good luck unlocking heroes or content without paying $30-40. -2 stars.

Your game is WAY too hard. I am at level 90+ and found the first 3 worlds great fun and balanced but now you have effectively destroyed the enjoyment factor by making the enemies SO strong that you cannot possibly beat them unless you have max level heroes...and the best max level heroes require so much to level up that without paying an absurd amount of real money you may aswell give up.you have broken what could have been the best game on android with selfish Pay 2 win tactics . Uninstalling after months of enjoyment and gameplay.  You need to fix this and make it challenging but not impossible
It's really addicting, a lot of challenges and puzzles for the towers... really loved it! Good job team!   A bit of improvement: maybe an easier way to access the other worlds would be really good!?
description: This is a tower defense challenge that lies in a magical fantasy world. Epic heroes fight in a war to defend the kingdom with top strategy and a rush of inspiration. Battle with Death Knights and fight alongside with knights, dragons, wizard, ice queen, and other ancient gods in the adventure field! The forces of evil amass. Why do they march? Where is their home? No one knows. The prophets' vision is cloudy. The geomancers see little in their maps. Everyone else? They flee. The Allied Kingdoms struggle to survive. Life and all its purpose has no meaning to these fiends. Fields rot. Woods burn. The common folk suffer. Devastation is happening! The Allied Kingdoms have one choice: defend, defend, defend. Are you ready? Realm Defense is a tower defense game that challenges veteran players. Use a huge variety of powers and abilities to vanquish wave after wave of menace for over 100 levels. Travel through lush forests, snow covered mountains, and epic desert as you face off against armies of slimes, goblins, skeletons, and more. Deploy rapid-fire archers! Carve walls on the map with magic beams! Fire roaring cannons! Summon allies! Realm Defense offers variety and challenge. Overcome incredible odds with strategy and wit! Rescue helpless villagers, collect important resources, and recruit legendary heroes with deadly abilities along the way to stop evil in this standout tower defense game. ¬†‚Ä¢	100+ levels with various game play modes‚Ä¢	Multiple worlds to play with 4 different towers each ‚Ä¢	Compete in tournament to show off your tower defense skills and win big prize‚Ä¢	Powerful heroes with unique abilities to aid you: Fee the Archer launches a deadly Kill Shot, Lancelot the Knight unleashes the Fist of Justice, Smoulder the Dragon rains down Heat Seeker fireballs and many more‚Ä¢	Face off against epic bosses including a Skeleton Mage that rides a giant slime and zaps your heroes and a bomb tossing, mammoth riding Goblin King‚Ä¢	Huge variety of enemies offer multiple challenges: Burn your enemy, freeze them, and more with 4 spells to cast in battle‚Ä¢	Beautiful landscapes and character animations ¬†¬†PLEASE NOTE! This game is free to play and made by people who love tower defense games. descriptionHTML:
The definitive high-definition FINAL FANTASY game for mobile phones!

Key Features:

■ A deep story and stunning visuals.
Experience an exciting story penned by Kazushige Nojima of FINAL FANTASY VII and FINAL FANTASY X fame, visualized with 3-D graphics never before seen in an RPG for mobile phones!
Each chapter release will be accompanied by grand in-game events adding new playable content and exciting customization items for your character!


■ A new and refined RPG turn-based battle.
Experience a new battle system specifically designed for mobile devices, creating highly tactical battles where each action flows into the next, chaining attacks and abilities in a rhythmic flow that brings destruction to your foes!


■ FINAL FANTASY's vaunted "Job System" returns.
Delve into a deep character customization system allowing for a near limitless number of combinations between job classes and specialized elemental abilities.
Choose your job, build your "deck," and destroy your enemies!



--------------------------------------

■Story: The Warrior of Light

Despair has cast a long, dark shadow across this land. The winds have stopped, the seas churn, and the earth rots.

The people await for a hero to appear—the hero foretold in an ancient prophecy: "When darkness shrouds the land, the Warrior of Light will come. Hope rides in his wake."

After a long journey across the Ether, castaways without pasts appear on the shores of Palamecia. One of them is destined to become the warrior of legend.

You stand among them.

Are you the hero whom the prophecy foretells?

--------------------------------------

■ Operating System
Android OS 4.0 or later

descriptionHTML:
Match sugar candies and swap rainbow drops to master this fun and challenging match-3 puzzle adventure inspired by THE BOOK OF LIFE!

Travel through DOZENS of fantastical worlds and conquer HUNDREDS of puzzle challenges! Compete and play with your friends! Download now today!

We interrupt this product description with breaking news: Book of Life has gone COCO LOCO for Dia de Los Muertos!

Goodbye beanie babies and so long fidget spinners – coconut shells are the latest craze, and they’re sweeping the citizens of San Angel into a tizzy of coco creations! Everywhere you look, residents are crafting spooky skulls out of coconut shells in preparation for Dia de los Muertos.

Sold-out grocers hang signs in their windows reading, "NO MO' COCO!" and tropical beaches have been picked clean of their natural coconut supply. It's safe to say that Mexico is loco for coco! Local hero Manolo Sánchez even posted a DIY tutorial on his blog yesterday for "Coco con Cocoa" a chocolate-y twist on this skeletal sensation.

Stay tuned as this story develops! We now return you to your regularly scheduled product description.

★ Hundreds of exciting levels themed to the animated movie
